title: The Perfect Pit Stop - /MOMO
description: What happens in pit lane at an endurance race? Henrique Cisneros, driver of the #30 MOMO NGT 991 Porsche GT3 Cup, explains the orchestrated movements of each of the pit crew members over the wall. How does it all happen so fast? Watch and learn.
tags: Porsche GT3 Cup, MOMO, pit stop, Porsche 911, pit crew
